title: LexDAO Community Dev
body:
Full proposal: https://hackmd.io/@thekerp/Byz56ZFHP

TLDR:
20,000 PAN budget from DAO Bank for Development Plan which will:
- Launch new LexDAO.org
- Launch Moloch v2x (see proposal for share dynamics, etc)
- Establish apprentice program
- Launch LexDAO 2020 NFT Pledge drive (if everything else is smooth.)
- Establish monthly community mgmt budget (paid in DAO shares)
author: 0xa3564677FC4907A15c9A7EAe1DBc1ae9aC57b8E1
